Reviews.Title: I like this unit
Reviews.Author: Rolando L. Casipit "appaslubo"
Reviews.Content: I like the computer in general. The only thing that I don't like is the hard drive which is 5400 RPM. It should be at least 7200 RPM to match the speed of the processor so that video editors like me don't have problem during rendering of video. The unit is over the need (requirement)for those who are just typing and doing some computer stuff but under rated for those who will use this for video editing and other task involving video rendering. I don't like the windows 8 as well, I cannot install some software that I need. They should adopt what windows7 have and compatible with. I give 4 star only because of the hard drive speed and windows8 compatibility.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good laptop
Reviews.Author: D. M. Buerkle
Reviews.Content: This laptop comes with Windows 8, but does not have the touch-display capabilities.  I find that the Windows 8 takes some getting used to, but there are pre-loaded videos that do a good job of explaining how to use this OS.The display and graphics are rather disappointing, despite calibration.  I wish I had paid the extra $$ for the Blu-ray player, but all in all, the memory, speed and functionality are decent for the amount I paid for this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Not as Advertised
Reviews.Author: secrist93
Reviews.Content: This laptop is advertised at having 1GB GDDR5 NVIDIA(R) GeForce GT 630M Graphics, but instead came with an Intel HD 4000 graphics card... needless to say I AM EXTREMELY disappointed....

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: domingo
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, very fast, good performance / cost, very light, comes with excellent numpad!, Not heated by the new system fancooler hp.

Reviews.Title: HP Envy dv6 laptop Core i7 Processor
Reviews.Author: Allen R. Sayler
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed to find out that the keyboard, which was supposed to be back-lite had no such feature.  I believe I paid extra for that and now have to figure out how to either get a reimbursement or just accept a laptop from Amazon without all of the features I ordered.  I expected that with Amazon's reputation, this kind of thing would not happened.  More needs to be done with the vendors you qualify to fill the orders.  Contact me to make this right.

Reviews.Title: The new dv6 ROCKS!!!
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: Like other reviewers, had to scale the learning curve on Windows 8 (start screen is designed primarily to market apps).  Came up with satisfactory workarounds to get down to business quickly.  The ENVY dv6 is FAST!!!  Boots up virtually INSTANTLY, and I'm online in the blink of an eye!  I LOVE the BACKLIT KEYBOARD as I work a lot at night.  Best of all, does not overheat like previous HP. Stays VERY cool! Also, over twice as much battery time as previous model (app 4 hours, give or take). This is the best all-around HP laptop I've owned in its price range.  Very happy.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: MJS
Reviews.Content: works great. enjoying it. what I wanted n a computer. Small enough but also large enough. Recommend it to everyone

Reviews.Title: a great laptop
Reviews.Author: John S.
Reviews.Content: its performing very well.  a good value and hasnt let me down at all...glad i bought it.  good choice for me

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Kyeunyoung An
Reviews.Content: I received it today at lunch time, it took round a week. Its really good better than I expected. Especially, its sound system, and screen brightness make me excited.

Reviews.Title: Love the computer! Hate the OS
Reviews.Author: joeyv
Reviews.Content: I love the feel and design of the computer, it feels sleek and modern and super fast. The problem I do have is with Windows 8, it sucks! It really does

Reviews.Title: I love this machine!!
Reviews.Author: Philip M. Smith "HartlyRed"
Reviews.Content: Outstanding laptop with outstanding service! Windows 8 took a day to get familiar to, but its pretty cool. Buy the computer and spend some time with Windows 8. You'll regret neither.

Reviews.Title: HP Laptops - Stay Away!
Reviews.Author: James Pachence
Reviews.Content: I've had my HP Envy m6 for about 2 months, and it is about ready to go into the trash.  I've heard the horror stories about HP laptops, and their unreliable software, but this computer seemed like such a great buy for its features.  Little did I know...Approximately every hour I need to reset my WiFi adapter, or reboot the computer.  I've talked to the HP technical folks, all from foreign lands with very thick accents, and they are incapable of fixing the problem.  The HP website has many people complaining about the same problem, and no fix will last for more than a day.Simple features, such as hibernate/sleep mode upon closing the lid, never worked properly.  I often have found the computer heating up in my briefcase, simply because it turned itself back on spontaneously.If I had the time, I would populate every single HP laptop site with this complaint, since the HP software problems are inherent to all HP products.

Reviews.Title: HP Envy dv6 with Intel core i7
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: The shipment was on time and the computer is very fast.  No problems so far.  I woud recomend this to others.

Reviews.Title: Metro Desktop
Reviews.Author: Horawala Withanage Don Udayanga Madumantha Vi...
Reviews.Content: It is good, But still I am not familiar with metro desktop. I am new to windos 8. I don't like what is Skype on metro desktop.

Reviews.Title: Love this HP laptop
Reviews.Author: BabyRotty "Di"
Reviews.Content: After previously purchasing an HP Envy dv6 laptop for my husband, when I needed to replace mine, I immediately opted for this latest model of it.  I feel it is a well rounded offering and excellent value for the price.  It was received promptly, was easy to set up, and I couldn't be happier.  I highly recommend this laptop to families and individuals.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: A. Elshaikh
Reviews.Content: I love using my new laptop it's very amazingIf you are thinking to get a new laptop for your daily use I highly recommend this one

Reviews.Title: Major Wireless Connection Issues
Reviews.Author: Thomas Teske
Reviews.Content: Cannot recommend this laptop! As a physician, I have been using this device for my electronic medical records system which relies on wifi. The connection spontaneously drops 20-30 times a day which has resulted in significant data loss and subsequent data re entry hassles (imagine inputting your entire physical exam and hitting save only to have the wifi connection drop and being unable to get the page back without refreshing it).  Have chatted with HP support multiple times and have replaced the WLAN module with zero improvement. Now waiting to return it to HP for further repairs.  My network works perfectly for every other device with zero dropped connections.

Reviews.Title: Very sastifying.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Bujosa
Reviews.Content: I've never had a large amount of time to understand and work with Windows 8 before but after a week of tweaking the settings and understanding the new input layout; it feels great. When I'm working in a low or no light area, the backlit keyboard works well. The keyboard layout feels exceptional. The Beats audio speakers are loud and clear. The battery satisfies my daily routines. The type of Games I play like Medieval War 2, but the graphics card can't handle any other games I love. If I had another $550 to drop, I would have gotten a custom laptop (Same Envy Dv6) with just better graphics card. All things aside, it's a very satisfying computer, and I would recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Slow and Unresponsive
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Bought mine at a warehouse discount store in December 2012 and regret to say that after having owned it now for 9 months, I wish that I'd purchased something else. It informs me on start up at times, that the fan isn't working but in fact, the fan is ramped up as high as it will go and blowing papers off my desk! The keyboard isn't back lit and the keys are difficult to see even in fairly well lit room because of the black keys and white lettering and the ten key forces you to work off centered from the laptop which creates an ergonomic challenge so if you are NOT used to having a ten key and don't really need one, then I totally recommend not getting one. It's slow and unresponsive at times and definitely not what I'd expected from a late generation i7 processor. The fan runs all of the time even when idle which is something I'm not used to with my old laptop running only when needed to cool. The fingerprint reader is so glitchy that I'd rather just type passwords instead of swiping because eventually you will rub the paint off the surface of the top or suffer a sore finger from trying to get it to recognize. It is a nice looking laptop with silver accents and the battery life is decent but could be better.

Reviews.Title: Very Good quality
Reviews.Author: Leanne Convis
Reviews.Content: This is my first new computer ever and it works like a charm. Windows 8 was funky to get used to, but it's a breeze working it now that I've had it for a day!

Reviews.Title: Great laptop.. but with screen issues.
Reviews.Author: Jeiner Fonseca R
Reviews.Content: I love this computer.. was so fast and pretty. All the materials were great, and the aluminium cover felt very nice. I could ran programs as SolidWorks, Matlab and Autocad by the same time. But the computer arrived with a screen issue. The screen started failing after 2 weeks of use, and after that a vertical line on pixels was dead. I knew intermediately that this was a factory issue so i returned it to be repair but i received a refund. 2 months later i don't have the computer, and now i have to buy another again.Edit: i bought another envy dv6 laptop and guess what???? same screen issues!!!!!! Worst PC screen design ever. Thanks God amazon refunded me my money i i built my own computer. HP, never again.

Reviews.Title: Good machine, but not as advertised
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Been playing with the machine a couple of days and it performs well. The unit unit was represented as having Bluetooth, but it does not exist on the machine I received.I use many Bluetooth devices, so it's a little disappointing to need to keep an external BT dongle attached.

Reviews.Title: A good PC
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Guerra
Reviews.Content: A good size PC I follow some friend recommendations, but I should have purchase with some accelerator option an probably with a better DVD disk unit manufactures come up with too many different products and no easy way too compare

Reviews.Title: felt cheated
Reviews.Author: nitin
Reviews.Content: I might be wrong but I did/tried to order which had Nvidia graphics card but got a laptop with only Intel graphics card.

Reviews.Title: great notebook!
Reviews.Author: Joseph kindle
Reviews.Content: It's not bad at all had it for bout a month.  The only thing is the battery life its only about 4 hours if that's not a problem it would be perfect for anyone who needs a good fast notebook.

Reviews.Title: Not a new computer - Don't buy!
Reviews.Author: Michal Vacek
Reviews.Content: I was pretty excited to get new notebook for decent price. The title "HP Envy dv6 Laptop(Latest Model)" is suspicious by itself what exactly is "latest model" is questionable, however configuration seemed fine so I went for it. When I got the package the computer box was also weird, no HP sticker seal and after closer look fingerprints on the notebook plus somebody was clearly messing with whole comp by unscrewing all screws - visible wear of paint. As I was expecting brand new machine sending this one back right away as used one would be $100 cheaper.

Reviews.Title: HP Envy dv6 Laptop(Latest Model), Intel 3rd generation Core i7-3630QM...
Reviews.Author: Judy C Miao
Reviews.Content: Sorry, I would not recommend the vendor who sent me this model.  It was a knockoff.  The sound was tinny and text was not clear.  Had other problems.  Did not perform like an HP product.  HP could not even help me and then told me they could not find the product code in their system.  I had to return this Amazon.  Very sad.  I am a very loyal Amazon customer and felt badly that I had to return it.  The Amazon Customer Service staff could not be more helpful and courteous.

Reviews.Title: Avoid at all costs!
Reviews.Author: Shiva Annamalai "khandesh"
Reviews.Content: This laptop was given to me as a gift from my parents.  I have had nothing but troubles with this piece of crap.  First of all this laptop has overheating problems.  HP is aware of this problem as they issued a mass recall about 5 years ago, but obviously they still haven't fixed it.This overheating problem happens every time that I watch movies or play games on it.  It becomes so hot that any contact with the metal (or the cheap plastic) that covers the outside of the laptop will literally burn you.When I ask HP about it they said, "Be more careful."  These people scammed my parents out of close to $1,000.  I am trying to return this crap, but HP will not assume responsibility for the defect.  They insist that they shipped out a completely perfect laptop that I broke within the first week of use.Give me a break.  Buying from companies like this, makes me want to vote for the free loading democrats just so they can bankrupt this piece of crap corporation.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS LAPTOP! PROBLEMS AFTER PROBLEMS AFTER PROBLEMS...
Reviews.Author: Larry Giang
Reviews.Content: This is my last and FINAL HP PRODUCT I WILL EVER BUY. They are made with CHEAP MATERIAL, PLASTIC AND HAVE BAD RATINGS ON ALL THEIR PRODUCTS. PEOPLE BUY THEM BECAUSE THEY ARE CHEAP.. THAT IS ALL!This laptop has been taken care and never even dropped or abused. There are cracks all around the edges of the laptop (ALL PLASTIC). The finger print scanner stopped working and the fan is extremely loud. Go to Google and type in "DV6 FAN PROBLEM", you would get millions of hits. The fan overheats and spins like its a V8 engine.. this happened RIGHT when the warranty expired! HP reps won't even goodwill you or even give you any sort of assist since warranty expired..I guess the ONLY good thing I can say about HP is that they are open 24/7!Other than that, cheap CRAP! and bad hardware!DO NOT BUY HP! ! !Update!!!!!!!HP takes care of their customers after seeing my review. They went out of their way to contact me and to resolve my issue. My laptop was provided with their extended warranty and eventually, everything got replaced due to lack of supplies with my 'old' laptop I originally bought.It took some time but worth the wait because they completely built me a brand new laptop and replaced it with my older one.Thank you! !  ! !
